name: Correspondence plot
disambiguatingDescription: Visual depiction of a cross-tabulation table which is projected in a (typically) two-dimensional space using the chi-squared distance as a measure of closeness/remoteness of the categories listed in the table.
description: Visual depiction of a cross-tabulation table which is projected in a (typically) two-dimensional space using the chi-squared distance as a measure of closeness/remoteness of the categories listed in the table.
